import React from "react"; import { NavLink, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { store } from "../features/store" import { logOut } from "../features/sessionSlice" import "./Navbar.css" function Navbar () { const isLoggedIn = useSelector(state => store.getState().isLoggedIn) // const isClient = useSelector(state => store.getState().isClient.isClient) const currentUser = useSelector(state => store.getState().user) const functie_id = currentUser.functie_id const dispatch = useDispatch(); const navigate = useNavigate() const handleLogout = e => { dispatch(logOut()) navigate("/signin") } return (
    {/* {isClient ? <>
  • Your groups
  • Your friends
    • :
  • Your products
    • } {isClient ? <>
  • Profile
    • :
  • Profile
    • } */} {functie_id==='O' && <>
  • Comunitate
  • Departamente
    • } {functie_id==='C' &&
  • Comunitate
    • } {functie_id==='D' &&
  • Departament
    • } {functie_id==='HR' && <>
  • Comunitate
  • Departamente
  • Profile
    • } {functie_id==='R' &&
  • Recrutare
    • }
  • Profile
) } export default Navbar
